Dog toy: If you have a playful or mischievous dog, use the hose as a chew toy for them to play with.
Impromptu pet wash station: Hang the hose so that the water flows down onto an area where your pet can drink and cool off.
Puddle puddle maker: When not in use, coiled hose can act like a makeshift dog toy to amuse your pet by dragging it across the ground.
Emergency toilet: In case of a plumbing issue or natural disaster, the hose can be used as a temporary water supply to flush the toilet.
DIY garden sprinkler: Attach a spray nozzle to the hose and use it as a makeshift garden sprinkler to water your plants.
